lines.text: ...you don't need Reldresal or me to fight a war!
Of course I don't need a prime minister to fight a war! But I need one to blame in case we lose it.
I hate justice, but I love law!
I have it! We could send him to Blefuscu and order THEM to kill him... That way he's their problem. It may not be nice, but it's legal!
Glorious victory over the wrong-end-of-the-egg scum!
Shame! Shame! Shame! How can you plot against Gulliver?
Now, now, now, dear, don't get excited. Nobody is plotting.
You can't fool me! The criers are going through the square proclaiming your kindness, and that means somebody is going to be executed soon.
